text:
Neuro-Sensing Interfaces (BIOE 742) – Spring 2025
Instructor: Prof. E. Garc´ıa
Assessment Plan
The course evaluates student progress through design logs, experiments, and collaborative reviews.
Assignment Timeline
Milestone 1: Signal Acquisition Warm-up
• Assigned: January 21, 2025
• Due: February 3, 2025 at 9:00 PM
• Submission: MATLAB script, two-page analysis memo.
• Points: 25
Milestone 2: EEG Headset Calibration Experiment
• Lab Session: February 14, 2025 at 10:00 AM
• Report Due: February 21, 2025 at 11:59 PM
• Deliverables: Experiment logbook (PDF), calibration dataset (CSV), reflection journal.
• Weight: 12%
Milestone 3: Midterm Literature Review
• Draft Due: March 3, 2025 at 5:00 PM
• Final Due: March 10, 2025 at 5:00 PM
• Deliverables: 12-page review article (IEEE format), annotated bibliography.
• Weight: 18%
Milestone 4: Prototype Validation Study
• Participant Testing: March 24–26, 2025
• Study Report Due: April 7, 2025 at 6:00 PM
• Deliverables: Validation dataset, statistical analysis notebook, executive summary slide
deck.
• Weight: 20%
Milestone 5: Final Interface Demonstration
• Demo Session: April 29, 2025 at 2:00 PM
1
• Final Submission Deadline: May 1, 2025 at 11:59 PM
• Deliverables: Demonstrationvideo, finalmanuscript(8pages), Gitrepository, userman-
ual.
• Weight: 25%
Milestone 6: Peer Evaluation Packet
• Due: May 2, 2025 at 6:00 PM
• Deliverables: Peer review forms for two teammates, self-evaluation questionnaire.
• Weight: 8%
Communication
Weekly design logs must be uploaded every Friday by 11:59 PM. Office hours Tuesday 3–5 PM.
2

text:
Autonomous Robotics (MECS 564) – Spring 2025
Instructor: Dr. L. Nakamura
Course Overview
This course covers planning, control, and perception for mobile robots. Assignments mix program-
ming, lab work, and presentations.
Major Deliverables
Assignment 1: Localization Lab
• Release: January 22, 2025
• Due: February 5, 2025 at 6:00 PM
• Deliverables: ROS bag files, lab report PDF, calibration spreadsheet.
• Points: 40
Assignment 2: SLAM Programming Assignment
• Release: February 5, 2025
• Due: February 26, 2025 at 11:59 PM
• Deliverables: GitHub repository link, README, video demonstration.
• Weight: 12% of course grade
Assignment 3: Midterm Design Review
• Review Meeting: March 5, 2025 at 2:30 PM
• Deliverables: Slide deck (PDF), prototype chassis photos, risk assessment table.
• Weight: 15%
Assignment 4: Field Test Report
• Test Window: March 24–27, 2025
• Report Due: April 2, 2025 at 5:00 PM
• Deliverables: Test logs (CSV), incident summary memo, footage highlights.
• Weight: 18%
Assignment 5: Capstone Demo and Write-up
• Demo Date: April 21, 2025 at 11:00 AM
• Final Submission: April 28, 2025 at 11:59 PM
1
• Deliverables: Demonstrationvideo,technicalpaper(10pages),posterPDF,codearchive.
• Weight: 30%
Assignment 6: Team Retrospective
• Due: April 30, 2025 at 6:00 PM
• Deliverables: Team retrospective worksheet, individual reflection form.
• Weight: 5%
Policies
Late submissions accepted up to 48 hours with a 10% penalty per day. All times are stated in
Pacific Time.
2

text:
Course: Advanced Machine Learning
Instructor: Dr. Rivera
Semester: Spring 2025

Assignment Schedule:
1. Homework 1 (Foundations Review)
   - Released: January 20, 2025
   - Due: February 3, 2025 at 11:59 PM
   - Deliverables: PDF solutions, Jupyter notebook with code.
   - Weight: 7%

2. Kaggle Warm-up Challenge
   - Released: January 27, 2025
   - Due: February 17, 2025 at 11:59 PM
   - Deliverables: Kaggle submission CSV, one-page reflection.
   - Weight: 10%

3. Midterm Project Proposal
   - Released: February 10, 2025
   - Due: March 3, 2025 at 5:00 PM
   - Deliverables: Proposal PDF (3 pages), teammate roles table.
   - Weight: 12%

4. Midterm Presentation
   - Presentation window: March 10, 2025 2:00 PM
   - Deliverables: Slide deck (PDF), demo video (5 minutes max).
   - Weight: 18%

5. Final Project Deliverables
   - Code Freeze: April 21, 2025 at 11:59 PM
   - Due: April 28, 2025 at 11:59 PM
   - Deliverables: Repository link, technical report (8 pages), poster PDF.
   - Weight: 28%

6. Peer Feedback Forms
   - Due: April 30, 2025 at 6:00 PM
   - Deliverables: Two peer evaluation forms via LMS.
   - Weight: 5%

Notes:
- All submissions via Canvas unless noted otherwise.
- Late policy: 48-hour grace period with 10% penalty per day.

text:
Course: Human-Centered Design Studio
Instructor: Prof. N. Patel
Term: Spring 2025

Key Assignments & Activities

Design Brief Assignment
- Assigned: January 15, 2025
- Due: January 29, 2025 at 5:00 PM
- Submit: PDF brief + mood board images.
- Weight: 8%

Research Plan & Interview Guide
- Assigned: January 29, 2025
- Due: February 12, 2025 at 6:00 PM
- Submit: Research plan document (PDF), interview script (DOCX).
- Weight: 10%

Low-Fidelity Prototype Critique
- Studio session: February 26, 2025 at 1:30 PM
- Submit: Five storyboard panels, paper prototype photos.
- Weight: 12%

Usability Testing Report
- Due: March 19, 2025 at 11:00 PM
- Submit: Test plan, observations spreadsheet, insights slide deck.
- Weight: 15%

Final Showcase Preparation
- Rehearsal: April 23, 2025 at 3:00 PM (attendance required)
- Deliver: Updated prototype, user journey map, presentation slides.
- Weight: 20%

Final Showcase & Submission
- Event: April 30, 2025 at 4:00 PM
- Final Submission Deadline: May 2, 2025 at 11:59 PM
- Submit: Final prototype assets, presentation recording, reflection memo.
- Weight: 25%

Reflection Journal Series
- Weekly entries due Sundays at 10:00 PM (Feb 2 – Apr 27, 2025)
- Submit: 500-word reflection via LMS.
- Weight: 10%

Course Policies
- Attendance at studio critiques is mandatory.
- Deadlines set to Eastern Time.
